```{r packages}
#install.packages("lobstr")
library(lobstr)
```

```{r}
x <- c(1,2,3)
y <- x
obj_addr(x)
#> [1] "0x7fe11b31b1e8"
obj_addr(y)
#> [1] "0x7fe11b31b1e8"
```

```{r}
a <- 1:10
b <- a
obj_addr(a)
obj_addr(b)

c <- b
obj_addr(c)

d <- 1:10
obj_addr(d)
```

```{r}
means <- list(
  mean,
  base::mean,
  get("mean"),
  evalq(mean),
  match.fun("mean")
)

for (i in 1:5){
  address <- obj_addr(means[[i]])
  print(address)
}
make.names()
```
